SELECT cms.employeeId, cms.name, mst.generalName as sexForList, DATE_FORMAT(cms.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') as birthday, DATE_FORMAT(cms.joiningDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as joiningDate FROM cms_employee cms left join cms_general_mst mst on cms.sex = mst.generalId and mst.generalKey = 'SEXY'
and employeeId = #{employeeId}
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by cms.joiningDate asc, cms.birthday asc
